resources.string: In Sonson Antioquia Colombia, you will find various hotels and lodgings $90,000 COP per night, excellent rooms with the best location nearby to the main square of the sonson park.
In sonson Antioquia there are many restaurants, with all the delicacies that offer a place that has all thermal smalls come and try our cuisines.
In sonson antioquia tourist sites you can visit. Hill of the old, Capiro, Paramo, House Museum of the grandparents, Religious Museum, Museum of the Corn Festivals among other tourist sites.
